result.text: #China has completed construction of the last batch of magnet-supporting products for the International Thermonuclear Experimental Reactor (ITER) project, and shipped the final consignment to France from #Guangzhou City, south China's Guangdong Province on Friday. The ITER, known as the world's biggest "#artificialsun," is an international nuclear fusion experiment based in France and one of the largest and most important international energy projects in the world.

legacy.full_text:
RT @ChinaSpox_India: Noted some misleading reports on China's scientific research vessel Shi Yan 6 docking at Colombo Port.
 
Shi Yan 6 con…

legacy.description: Spokesperson of Chinese Embassy in India, sharing facts
legacy.name: Wang Xiaojian

result.text:
Noted some misleading reports on China's scientific research vessel Shi Yan 6 docking at Colombo Port.
 
Shi Yan 6 conducting marine scientific research activities is consistent with international law and international customary practice. Outcomes of the research activities will promote the sustainable utilsation of the ocean. Labelling Shi Yan 6 as a “Spy Ship” is totally absurd and groundless. 

Sri Lanka is a transportation hub in the Indian Ocean. Vessels from various countries, including India and USA,  have made port calls in Sri Lanka for replenishment.  Normal scientific research activities in the Indian Ocean should not be disrupted.

legacy.full_text:
"भाषा हमें एक साथ लाती है।"
आधुनिक चीनी और भारतीय साहित्य के अनुवाद के लिए समर्पित बेइजिंग फ़ॉरन स्टडीज़ यूनिवर्सिटी में एक भारतीय व्याख्याता ने दोनों देशों के बीच सांस्कृतिक आदान-प्रदान के अपने अनुभव साझा किए। https://t.co/i6boUCz8Xq
भाषा हमें एक साथ लाती है।
